        public java.lang.String getAirports(java.lang.String ticketAgency)
        Return an XML list of all the airports Retrieve the list of airports available to the specified ticketAgency via HTTPGet of the server

        Returns:
        xml string listing all airports

                                  java.lang.String dep,
                                  java.lang.String date)
        Return an XML list of all the Flights Retrieve the list of flights available to the specified ticketAgency, departure, arrival, date via HTTPGet of the server
        Parameters:
        ticketAgency - identifies the ticket agency requesting the information
        dep - identifies the departure airport
        date - identifies the date of departure
        Returns:
        xml string listing all Flights

      • lock

        public boolean lock(java.lang.String ticketAgency)
        Send lock request to DB then get access resutl from the DB Return the access result of the request.
        Parameters:
        ticketAgency - identifies the ticket agency requesting the information
        Returns:
        True if the DB access successes and false if not

      • unlock

        public boolean unlock(java.lang.String ticketAgency)
        Send unlock request to the DB then get access result from DB. Return the result of the request.
        Parameters:
        ticketAgency - identifies the ticket agency requesting the information
        Returns:
        true if the DB access successes and false if not.
